data: The little Pilgrim, whose story has been told in another place, and who had arrived but lately on the other side, among those who know trouble and sorrow no more, was one whose heart was always full of pity for the suffering.

The Little Pilgrim: Further Experiences.
Stories of the Seen and the Unseen.
